Name: El Presidente Menocal Special
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: What hot Cuban summers are made for.
History: Created by Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert at El Floridita in Havana, Cuba. This recipe is adapted from a 1937 Bar Florida (later renamed Floridita) menu. The name refers to Mario García Menocal, who was president of Cuba from 1912 to 1920.
